item.title: Actresses Forced to Quiet the Voice of Vagina Monologues
item.description: Masturbation, portrayed on stage: One of the play's more controversial scenes — and a taboo topic in ChinaPhoto: Jennifer Zhang BEIJING - The Chinese version of The Vagina Monologues – entitled “She Says” – was performed by a controversial feminist group on March 25th in Beijing. While the first five scenes went smoothly, during the last scene, the performer was not allowed to use a microphone by some cultural censorship committee, due to sensitivity over the content.
